description: This file defines the HomeScreen widget for a Flutter app, implementing a role-based dashboard with various UI components, navigation, and state management.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: Main widget for the role-based dashboard screen

classes.name: _HomeScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the dynamic UI and interactions of HomeScreen

classes.name: _ListTile
classes.description: Widget for displaying icon and label list items

classes.name: _ResponsiveDrawerHeader
classes.description: Header widget for the navigation drawer, showing current role

methods.name: _buildHeader
methods.description: Constructs the header with title, icons, and role pills

methods.name: _roleGridOrColumn
methods.description: Builds role-specific content arranged either in grid or column layout depending on screen size

methods.name: _buildRoleSelector
methods.description: Creates a dropdown menu for selecting user roles

methods.name: _buildRolePills
methods.description: Creates toggle pills for quick role switching

methods.name: _titleForRole
methods.description: Returns a string title based on the selected role

methods.name: _adminOrders
methods.description: UI section for Admin Orders Management

methods.name: _adminMenu
methods.description: UI section for Admin Menu Management

methods.name: _adminUsers
methods.description: UI section for Admin Users Management

methods.name: _managerOrders
methods.description: UI section for Manager Orders Overview

methods.name: _managerLocations
methods.description: UI section for managing locations and time slots
